comments:
OS : Fedora Core 6 fully updated with FC6 Eclipse & Subclipse, and PDT 0.7RC3.

When working with a subversion repository, selecting an "SVN Annotation" entry
yields this error :
"Unable to create this part due to an internal error. Reason for the failure: An exception was thrown during initialization"

and throws the follwing exception :

java.lang.NullPointerException

Please download in a few days the latest PDT version and try again
